name: Buck Tuck and the wrath of Dark B. Goode - Playable demo
name_original: Buck Tuck and the wrath of Dark B. Goode - Playable demo
description:
'Every 100 years, the forces of good mysteriously start to weaken, as the strange being known as "Dark B. Goode" begins to grow stronger and stronger. A hero is chosen at random to combat the evil "Dark B. Goode," and the world usually relies on the noble hero's strength and bravery.'

'However, Dark B. Goode has grown far too strong this time. Who will save us from a future of eternal torment and pain?! WHO WILL SAVE US?!'

'The answer might not be who you were expecting.'

"Buck Tuck and the wrath of Dark B. Goode" is a passion project made by indie dev studio "Buzzcut interactive" made in the Construct 3 game engine. The current demo includes one playable level (That being "Level one: Bugaboo creek"), and three different costumes for the main character.

Please leave feedback in the comments, or at Buzzcut Interactive's discord: https://discord.gg/KW8H3avgsG
